posts.author: an ominous cow herd
posts.content:
Not a spectacular build, but I didn't see the class combo posted as of yet. Good offense with the ability to turtle when things get hairy... and when you're a dwarf, things are always hairy.

The leftover skillpoints can be used for whatever is useful in your particular environment. I put them into Disable Trap, Heal and Open Lock but Concentration might be a good alternative if you need to resist Taunts.

posts.author: Valerfor
posts.content:
I DO like him!
Just enough Lvls for Defensive Awareness II, so you can't be flanked or sneak-attacked plus WM criticals with an Axe or a Hammer and even WS and IKD from Fighter and nearly three hundred hit points!
This Dwarf is dangerous in a Lvl 20 environment.
